title: Nine Months to Change His Life
description: 'I rescued you on this island…and you rescued me right back." Ben Logan never asks anyone for help. Until, during a deadly hurricane, he's washed up on a deserted island. There he finds his life in the hands of sparky, petite nurse Mary Hammond. Trapped with only each other for comfort, Ben and Mary turn to one another. Back home safely, Mary dominates Ben's dreams. And when, three months later, Mary arrives at Ben's New York office, it's with news that their one night had the power to change their lives forever…. Don't miss Ben's twin brother's story, The Maverick Millionaire by Alison Roberts, on sale next month!
author: Marion Lennox
